event Approval(address indexed owner, address indexed spender, uint256 value)
event Transfer(address indexed from, address indexed to, uint256 value)
function allowance(address holder, address spender) view returns (uint256 allowance_)
function approve(address spender, uint256 amount) returns (bool status_)
function balanceOf(address account) view returns (uint256 balance_)
function decreaseAllowance(address spender, uint256 amount) returns (bool)
function increaseAllowance(address spender, uint256 amount) returns (bool)
function transfer(address recipient, uint256 amount) returns (bool status_)
function transferFrom(address holder, address recipient, uint256 amount) returns (bool status_)
